tool.name: SearchUsingStartingPoint

param.name: StreamSelectionType
param.expression: Upstream with Tributaries | Upstream Main Path Only | Downstream with Divergences | Downstream Main Path Only | Point to Point
param.dialogReference: Navigation methodology for network discovery of linked data.

param.name: StartingPoint
param.dialogReference: Coordinate location to be indexed to the appropriate NHDPlus flowline from which to begin the navigation.

param.name: MaxDistanceKm
param.dialogReference: Distance in kilometers to limit navigation. If MaxDistanceKm or MaxFlowTimeDay is not provided the full extent of the navigation will be returned. For certain configurations in large networks this is likely to timeout or otherwise fail to return results.

param.name: MaxFlowtimeDay
param.dialogReference: Flow time in days to limit navigation. If MaxDistanceKm or MaxFlowTimeDay is not provided the full extent of the navigation will be returned. For certain configurations in large networks this is likely to timeout or otherwise fail to return results.

param.name: SearchForTheseLinkedData
param.expression: {Clean Watersheds Needs Survey | Fish Consumption Advisories | Fish Tissue Data | Facilities that Discharge to Water | Facility Registry Service | Water Quality Portal Monitoring Data}
param.dialogReference: Choose linked data programs to discover during navigation.

param.name: ShowSelectedStreams
param.dialogReference: Flag as to whether to return all flowlines of the navigation.

param.name: ShowSourceData
param.dialogReference: Flag whether to return feature classes showing event source geometry. Not all OW linked program datasets provide source data at this time.

param.name: AttributeHandling
param.dialogReference: Option to return linked data attributes as tabular data alongside service results. As of early 2026 the Esri Experience Builder Analysis widget does not support free standing tables and requesting such will abend GeoViewer results.

param.name: NHDPlusVersion
param.dialogReference: Stream network used as framework for OW Linked Data Events. Currently only v2.1 medium resolution NHDPlus is supported.

param.name: AdvancedConfiguration
param.dialogReference: Keywords reserved for advanced usage of the geoprocessing service. Contact EPA Office of Water for more information.

tool.summary: Service to discover EPA Office of Water linked program data.
